credit_line: Gift of The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology
title: Alice in Wonderland
description: Children's paper with scenes and figures from the children's story.  Figures include Alice, Mad Hatter, the caterpillar and the Cheshire cat. Printed in orange, yellow, blue, green and pink on glossy white ground.
